title: FPS drops to the point of unplayability
body: Lately (the last month or so) I have noticed while playing League of Legends that my FPS would dip to very low levels (sub 40 in lane, sub 20 in teamfights) and when I try to close the client it will not respond at all. It forces me to reset my computer. When I get back into the game after this, it's back to the normal 180 FPS. Anyone else have a similar issue or know how I can fix it?

replies.body: I wonder if you're seeing this FPS drop due to a missing graphics driver update. It'd be good to check for that first, but you can also find some other troubleshooting steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting).
